website_summaries.verdict: An affordable version of a Western-style handsaw. Coarse cutting teeth provide elements of both rip and cross cut saws. Great for casual users who need to add a decent handsaw to their existing collection.
pros: Ergonomic grip reduces hand and arm fatigue
Blade and teeth design improve efficiency per stroke, up to three times faster than traditional handsaws
Retail price price point is very impressive
cons: May not work well on harder woods
Some users find angle notations on blade confusing
Shorter blade length could actually increase arm and hand fatigue

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because my husband has one very similar ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my husband has one very similar that is a hard working saw. This one was more light weight and bends if you saw too fast or are not really careful. It won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: J Faye

customer_reviews.title: My favorite saw now
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video, and it is true, this saw will not bend, and 'gall' when sawing wood. I use it with the mitre box on trim and the wood does not 'fray' cuts clean. Must be the design of the blade and the angle of the handle grip that makes it so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent saw!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice saw! I was really impressed with how fast it cuts. I do a lot of repurposing of wood pallets and this saw is perfect for the job. Fast clean cuts, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice utility project hand saw
customer_reviews.text: Well made, balanced, nice handle. Correct # of teeth and how it is chiseled to cut material Balance and sharp enough to cut small 1” wide X 3/4” plywood X 2” long using no clamp and just hand held Works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp, zero clearance and made of heavy gauge steel.
customer_reviews.text: Razor sharp, and made of nice, heavy gauge steel, the saw did exactly what I needed it to do: it allowed me to cut out bottom plates (framing) at doorways, with zero clearance.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The teeth are sharp and it seems to work ok on 5/4 deck board but the blade is way too thin and flimsy. Would be great as a pull saw but it has a tendency to bow when you push against it. I've been considering cutting it down and installing a handle in a pull configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpin Jehosaphat

customer_reviews.title: Best Handsaw Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love it I’ve had it for a month already it’s the best yet. It truly is universal I use it all types of wood, so light, flexible, and easy to use. First Handsaw that does the job for you, no need to exert yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Diaz

customer_reviews.title: This is the saw you need in your workshop!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best saw I've owned! Very impressed how it cuts through 2x4's and tree limbs. I've cut through 6 inch diameter limbs without breaking a sweat!
customer_reviews.author: hondo

customer_reviews.title: Better then advertised
customer_reviews.text: This saw cuts wood better then any handsaw I've used. I bought it to maker miter cuts in 4 X 4 lumber for a project I was making. It was like cutting butter.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur N. Rosenshein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great general purpose saw. My grandkids (age 11 & 12) use this saw a lot and really like it. I also like it as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Glena S.

customer_reviews.title: The Saw from Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: These are crazy sharp. I love it. No more toy saws for me. Usually I don't bother getting my power saw out anymore. I don't think they can be resharpened, so use them carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Grampy of the North

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised to see "Made in Denmark" on blade. Worked well for what I needed. The 20" was just right & easy to handle for me (a novice hand saw user).
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Cut the mustard!
customer_reviews.text: Watch your step! This is the fastest cutting was I have ever used! It is so good that I also bought the larger model too.
customer_reviews.author: Perry J Hite Jr

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: This saw has a very user friendly feel to it. It has the right stiffness to the blade and cuts great.
customer_reviews.author: rogebran

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to build a boardwalk over a swamp on a trail. 55 feet of boardwalk later and a bunch of chores around the house, I really like this saw. I like my sliding compound miter saw way more. But this is remarkably easy to use vs. an old fashioned carpenter saw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great saw.
customer_reviews.text: The saw is exactly as described and arrived when expected.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Great saw. Will cut materials quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great saw. Will cut materials quickly. great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a different type saw for projects upcoming and for the price point is well worth the purchase. And, shopping on amazon is very easy especially with the recommendations and add-ons.
customer_reviews.author: BPD

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp and nice versatile size for odd jobs when convenience is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp and nice versatile size for odd jobs when convenience is a deciding factor. Great addition to DIY home tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Eppes

customer_reviews.title: 7th Heaven
customer_reviews.text: WOW, great saw. Cuts through everything and quickly too. Lightweight and easy to handle and my husband is in 7th heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Karen 505

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine kerf and a good cutting saw. I use it for just about everything. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Manazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little saw. Really rips through different wood cuts very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cuts fast and clean, not a miracle saw but works well, hope it will stay sharp for long
customer_reviews.author: Garik

customer_reviews.title: IRWIN THE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought thi saw made my live very easy, and simple !
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: cuts very well and fast. glade to have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: April Allen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Tossin out my old hand saws.
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten this one a long time ago. Perfect for cuts unreachable with power saws.
customer_reviews.author: Dzedo

customer_reviews.title: Great little saw.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little saw, it saws thru lumber quicker than my conventional saw
customer_reviews.author: KWR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what I wanted. I needed a short saw for a tight spot. It cut well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gibbons Jr

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Husband found it in one of his magazines and wanted to try it out. He says it works just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good sharp saw that is not to heavy or long.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent saw.
customer_reviews.text: My son prefers this one to the 20" Irwin saw, as it is just right for his 11yr old hands. "This almost makes sawing FUN," he says.
customer_reviews.author: WalkingPoint

customer_reviews.title: Universal saw, out of this universe.
customer_reviews.text: Best little saw I've ever owned. Very versatile, cuts in both directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gremba

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these blades in my business and they don't let me down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best handsaw so far.
customer_reviews.text: My best saw I have every purchased so far. Easier to grip and cuts better than my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: SKK

customer_reviews.title: good to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: this saw is by far the best handsaw i've ever used. it is extremely sharp, which translates to quick, accurate cuts. should not be confused with a standard crosscut handsaw. the cuts are nowhere near that smooth.truth is, i use a power saw for almost everything. this irwin saw is just right for what a circular saw can't reach. i bought a second one to give to my son who is interested in woodwork.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: just the right size for traveling tool box, sturdy and has added information on side of saw, angle and guards
customer_reviews.author: William Lillie

customer_reviews.title: greatest handsaw ever
customer_reviews.text: best saw I have ever used. Recommend it highly, I used it on my oak tree branches etc. it is the greatest handsaw ever.
customer_reviews.author: jillou

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dismember a cut Christmas tree when the time came to compost it. It worked well for that task. The angled cutouts and lines that are supposed to facilitate cutting at various angles still puzzle me, though, and I have a degree in math.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it cuts like a hot knife in the butter. One of the best. We got a few other, but this one became the favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: got to love that! Dad loves the saw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my dad, it was at least $5-8 more expensive at the big box stores when I looked. Shipped in 2 days and saved money from the comfort of my home, got to love that! Dad loves the saw, it's very handy and sharp. I've used it a few times and it cuts great for what I needed it to. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Handsaw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this handsaw for myself to use for moderate use projects around my home. I have not pushed this handsaw very hard yet, but for light duty home repair jobs (cutting drywall and wood 2"x4"s) it has worked beautifully. So far it has lived up to my expectations and that is why I rated it 5 stars. My work experience is novice-moderate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Matias

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as Handyman mag said - just another hand saw.
customer_reviews.author: Jbman

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw!
customer_reviews.text: This handsaw works like one should no problems at all using it. Cuts are great and straight. Small size makes it a great carry around tool, but still big enough to tackle larger jobs.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a real niffty saw and even better than you said. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Not for hardwood
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking saw but that's it!Might work for cutting limbs or soft wood,as some of you are,but when I tried to saw an ash 2"x6" plank [brand new saw,first cut]the teeth hung up constantly causing the blade to buckle some.The saw jumped around making the cut over an 1/8" wide and inconsistent.NO smooth cutting like it should be.Gave up after sawing less than 2" and finished my cuts with an old miter saw that worked flawlessly.$19 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: It seems like the right size for a tool box
customer_reviews.text: I, myself, have not used it. It was a christmas gift for my daughter. It seems like the right size for a tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Keith McCright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through wood like butter!! Superior performance, unlike anything I've used before. Portable, cool look, light weigh, precise control. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Careaga

customer_reviews.title: To saw or not to saw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband thinking it would be less of a strain on his hands and arms as sawing items aggravates his neuropathy. But he said the work is harder with this saw. He quit using it and returned to his old hand saw with the longer blade.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

product_meta.title: IRWIN Tools Universal Handsaw, 15-Inch (1773465)
product_meta.description:
This IRWIN Universal Handsaw features a unique handle-to-blade design and triple-ground teeth to completely eliminate binding and cut up to 3 times faster than traditional handsaws through virtually any material. The universal tooth grind on each handsaw removes material quickly to combine the speed of a coarse-cutting saw with the finish of a fine-cutting saw. A tapered-pitch nose on the blade profile provides improved clearance through materials and adds stability to each stroke, while the thick-body saw blade uses a water-based lacquer coating that helps you deliver fast, controlled cuts.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Irwin 1773456 Universal 15-inch Handsaw delivers performance and quality results that users demand on the jobsite. With a patent-pending handle design, the angle in which force is exerted converts energy into full blade strokes, cutting through virtually any material. This specially designed handle, combined with universal triple grind teeth, completely eliminates binding, and cuts three times faster than traditional hand saws. The Universal Handsaw provides the speed of a coarse-cutting saw, and the fine finish of a fine-cutting saw. No matter what the applicationn this powerful handsaw will hold up to the demands on the jobsite, proving to be the only handsaw the professional tradesman will ever need.
feature_bullets: Featuring triple-ground teeth, this handsaw cuts up to 3 times faster than traditional handsaws
This handsaw utilizes a universal tooth grind to remove material quickly
A tapered-pitch nose improves clearance and adds stability
The thick-body handsaw blade incorporates a water-based lacquer coating to help deliver fast, controlled cuts
A comfort grip is made from high-density resin and molded into an ergonomic shape for less hand fatigue
